about_the_game:
Parkdens is a nature park builder game where you can place tiles next to each other to create beautiful combination of gardens, landscapes and areas. Then a variety of the objects that turns a simple landscape into a nature park like trees, boats, grounds, decks, huts, fountains etc. can be placed on the top of the tiles to create unique, interesting and beautiful parks, mini forests, sitting areas and lakes.

There is sandbox mode where the tiles and objects can be placed freely without any restrictions and you can construct the parks of your dreams! Another mode is level mode where correct objects needs to be placed next to each other in order to unlock more tiles and progress to the next level.

There are 2 themes for the parks -
- Greenery
- Desert
